scripts.build: rimraf build && tsc --build tsconfig.build.json && tsc --build tsconfig.es6.json && ts-node scripts/rewrite.ts && ts-node scripts/rewrite-locals.ts && ts-node scripts/package.ts
scripts.bench: node bench/index.js && node bench/nestedMap.js && node bench/nestedChain.js
scripts.autofix: yarn prettier && yarn lint --fix && yarn prettier
